title: Blood Red Throne - Souls of Damnation (2009) MP3 320kbps
description:
The limited edition first pressing of SOULS OF DAMNATION will include two bonus tracks, plus a special bonus DVD featuring an exclusive new interview with the band and an in-depth studio diary, documenting the recording process of the album.
Check out a trailer featuring clips of the music along with footage from the bonus DVD at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yzn8GkkXmFc
SOULS OF DAMNATION is due to be released by Earache Records on June 1st in Europe and June 30th in the USA.  The full track listing for the album is as
follows:
01. The Light, The Hate
02. Harme
03. Throne Of Damnation
04. Human Fraud
05. Demand
06. Your Cold Flesh
07. Prove Yourself Dead
08. Not Turgenjev, But Close
09. Ten Steps Of Purgatory
10. Manifest Of Lies*
11. Affiliated With The Suffering*
(* limited edition bonus tracks)

If you like it, buy it. Support death metal! |,,|, (>_<) ,|,,|
